wikipedia_page.main: William Alexander Ross (15 November 1913 – 28 September 1942) was a Scottish international rugby union player, who was killed in World War II.He was capped twice for Scotland in 1937 at fly-half. He also played for Hillhead RFC.

link_mentions.page: List of Scottish rugby union players killed in World War II
response: * William Alexander Ross, died on 28 September 1942
